revised_title: Spectrum Analysis of Comet Brooks (1911 c)
tldr: The author analyzed the spectrum of Comet Brooks in 1911, discovering several lines and bands in the spectrum. They compared their findings with previous comet spectra, such as Comet Daniel, and found similarities in the lines and bands present. The author also observed changes in the spectrum as the comet moved from an evening to a morning object. The origin of some lines, such as the ultra-violet lines, remains uncertain.
